article_title: One hot show at the museum
article_text:
WHAT: "Pyro-Protagonists: A Generation of Ceramic Artists"

WHEN: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Tuesday through Friday; 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. Saturday; 1 to 5 p.m. Sunday. Exhibit continues through Sunday, Sept. 14.

WHERE: Washington County Museum of Fine Arts, City Park, Hagerstown.

COST: Free

CONTACT: Call 301-739-5727, email info@wcmfa.org or go to www.wcmfa.org.

og.description: The temperatures are rising as we get into the full swing of summer. So why not stop by the Washington County Museum of Fine Arts for one hot exhibit? "Pyro Protagonists: A Generation of Ceramic Artists" recognizes 22 ceramic artists whose total con
